camellya:FlowerCard.NAME: Flying Petals
camellya:FlowerCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal 5+X damage to ALL enemies and apply 1+X stacks of camellya:Poisoned.
camellya:FlowerCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 7+2X damage to ALL enemies and apply 2+X stacks of camellya:Poisoned.

camellya:SwitchToBlooming.NAME: Blooming Form
camellya:SwitchToBlooming.DESCRIPTION: Remove camellya:Withering Form. Gain !M! Strength. Gain camellya:Blooming Form. Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

camellya:SwitchToWithering.NAME: Withering Form
camellya:SwitchToWithering.DESCRIPTION: Remove camellya:Blooming Form. Gain !M! Dexterity. Gain camellya:Withering Form. Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

camellya:SharpFlowerBranch.NAME: Sharp Flower Branch
camellya:SharpFlowerBranch.DESCRIPTION: Deal 11+2Y damage to target enemy. If no other attack cards were played this turn, draw 2 cards.
camellya:SharpFlowerBranch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 14+3Y damage to target enemy. If no other attack cards were played this turn, draw 2 cards.

camellya:BarbedFlowerBranch.NAME: Barbed Flower Branch
camellya:BarbedFlowerBranch.DESCRIPTION: Deal 8+Y damage to target enemy. Apply 2 Weak.
camellya:BarbedFlowerBranch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 10+2Y damage to target enemy. Apply 3 Weak.

camellya:RoseSwordsman.NAME: Rose Swordsman
camellya:RoseSwordsman.DESCRIPTION: Slash target enemy 3 times, dealing 3+Y damage each time, then draw 1 card.
camellya:RoseSwordsman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Slash target enemy 3 times, dealing 4+2Y damage each time, then draw 1 card.

camellya:HuaChao.NAME: Flower Festival
camellya:HuaChao.DESCRIPTION: Deal 4+X+Y damage to 2 random enemies, then gain !B! Block.
camellya:HuaChao.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 5+2X+2Y damage to 2 random enemies, then gain !B! Block.

camellya:LuoHong.NAME: Fallen Petals
camellya:LuoHong.DESCRIPTION: Deal 4+2X damage to ALL enemies and gain Block equal to half the unblocked damage dealt (rounded down).
camellya:LuoHong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 6+2X damage to ALL enemies and gain Block equal to half the unblocked damage dealt (rounded down).

camellya:LoveFlower.NAME: Love Flower
camellya:LoveFlower.DESCRIPTION: Deal 7+2Y damage to target enemy and reduce their Strength by Y+1.
camellya:LoveFlower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 7+3Y damage to target enemy and reduce their Strength by Y+2.

camellya:WillowWhip.NAME: Willow Whip
camellya:WillowWhip.DESCRIPTION: Whip 3 times, dealing !D! damage to ALL enemies each time, then put 1 card from your hand into the discard pile.
camellya:WillowWhip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whip 3 times, dealing !D! damage to ALL enemies each time, then put 1 card from your hand into the discard pile.

camellya:SuffocatingVine.NAME: Suffocating Vine
camellya:SuffocatingVine.DESCRIPTION: Deal 8+2Y damage to target enemy and apply 1+Y Suffocation.
camellya:SuffocatingVine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 11+3Y damage to target enemy and apply 2+2Y Suffocation.

camellya:BloodsuckingVine.NAME: Bloodsucking Vine
camellya:BloodsuckingVine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal 8+X damage to ALL enemies and heal HP equal to 20% of unblocked damage dealt.
camellya:BloodsuckingVine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 10+2X damage to ALL enemies and heal HP equal to 30% of unblocked damage dealt.

camellya:BarricadeVine.NAME: Barricade Vine
camellya:BarricadeVine.DESCRIPTION: Deal 12+2X+2Y damage to target enemy and gain 3+X+2Y Block.
camellya:BarricadeVine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 16+2X+2Y damage to target enemy and gain 5+2X+3Y Block.

camellya:FallenCamellia.NAME: Fallen Camellia
camellya:FallenCamellia.DESCRIPTION: Shatter all of a target enemy's Block, then deal 12+2Y damage to that enemy.
camellya:FallenCamellia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shatter all of a target enemy's Block, then deal 18+3Y damage to that enemy.

camellya:OleanderBranch.NAME: Oleander Branch
camellya:OleanderBranch.DESCRIPTION: Stab target enemy with an oleander branch, dealing 12+2Y damage and applying 3 turns of Vulnerable and 3 turns of Weak.
camellya:OleanderBranch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stab target enemy with an oleander branch, dealing 15+3Y damage and applying 4 turns of Vulnerable and 4 turns of Weak.

camellya:ReedAutumn.NAME: Reed Autumn
camellya:ReedAutumn.DESCRIPTION: Sweep a target enemy with bleak autumn wind, dealing 11+2Y damage and applying 3 stacks of camellya:Poisoned.
camellya:ReedAutumn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sweep a target enemy with bleak autumn wind, dealing 14+3Y damage and applying 3 stacks of camellya:Poisoned.

camellya:FallenLeaves.NAME: Fallen Leaves
camellya:FallenLeaves.DESCRIPTION: Deal 28+3X+2Y damage to ALL enemies and apply 2 turns of Vulnerable.
camellya:FallenLeaves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 32+4X+3Y damage to ALL enemies and apply 3 turns of Vulnerable.

camellya:OneDayFlower.NAME: One-Day Flower
camellya:OneDayFlower.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal 48 + 3X damage to ALL enemies. Gain 4 Strength.
camellya:OneDayFlower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal 57 + 4X damage to ALL enemies. Gain 6 Strength.

camellya:BloomingAshes.NAME: Blooming Ashes
camellya:BloomingAshes.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal 24+2X damage to ALL enemies, apply Y+2 turns of Weak, Y+2 turns of Vulnerable, and 4 stacks of camellya:Poisoned.
camellya:BloomingAshes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Deal 28+3X damage to ALL enemies, apply Y+2 turns of Weak, Y+2 turns of Vulnerable, and 4 stacks of camellya:Poisoned.

camellya:HeatRelief.NAME: Heat Relief
camellya:HeatRelief.DESCRIPTION: Heal 10 HP and gain 10 Block. Exhaust.

camellya:AutumnHarvest.NAME: Autumn Harvest
camellya:AutumnHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Weak and 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
camellya:AutumnHarvest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Weak and 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust. Cost becomes 0.

camellya:WinterStorage.NAME: Winter Storage
camellya:WinterStorage.DESCRIPTION: Retaliate against the next 2 attacks with your base attack.
camellya:WinterStorage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retaliate against the next 3 attacks with your base attack.

camellya:FlowerSecret.NAME: Flower Secret
camellya:FlowerSecret.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain 2 Dexterity, discard 1 card, then draw 3 cards.
camellya:FlowerSecret.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. Gain 3 Dexterity, discard 1 card, then draw 4 cards.

camellya:SpringBeauty.NAME: Spring Beauty
camellya:SpringBeauty.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity, and 4 stacks of Metallicize.
camellya:SpringBeauty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Strength and 4 Dexterity, and 5 stacks of Metallicize.

camellya:SpringHeart.NAME: Spring Heart
camellya:SpringHeart.DESCRIPTION: Immediately restore 1 exhausted card and make its cost 0 this turn.
camellya:SpringHeart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Immediately restore 1 exhausted card and make its cost 0 this turn.

camellya:RestAndRecover.NAME: Rest and Recover
camellya:RestAndRecover.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, heal 2 HP and gain 1 Strength.
camellya:RestAndRecover.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, heal 3 HP and gain 1 Strength.

camellya:FertileSoil.NAME: Fertile Soil
camellya:FertileSoil.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is exhausted, immediately draw 1 card.
camellya:FertileSoil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is exhausted, immediately draw 2 cards.

camellya:Photosynthesis.NAME: Photosynthesis
camellya:Photosynthesis.DESCRIPTION: After playing, increase your energy cap by 1 for the rest of combat.
camellya:Photosynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After playing, increase your energy cap by 1 for the rest of combat.

camellya:CamelliaFertilizer.NAME: Camellia Fertilizer
camellya:CamelliaFertilizer.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 6 Block and 1 Dexterity.
camellya:CamelliaFertilizer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 8 Block and 2 Dexterity.

camellya:BlowAgain.NAME: Blow Again
camellya:BlowAgain.DESCRIPTION: The first attack that deals damage to you each turn heals you for 4 HP and gives you 1 Strength.
camellya:BlowAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first attack that deals damage to you each turn heals you for 6 HP and gives you 2 Strength.

camellya:BeyondWithering.NAME: Beyond Withering
camellya:BeyondWithering.DESCRIPTION: After using, Block will not disappear at the end of turn.
camellya:BeyondWithering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After using, Block will not disappear at the end of turn.
